short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage sprint standup participants and timer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage sprint standup: add a list of participants, the total time is 15 minutes, the total time will be divided by the number of participants. The list can be edited. There is a Next button to manually skip a participant.
